name: Ground Turkey Casserole
author: Beki
summary: Its quick, fun and great! I learned this in grammar school. You may want to serve with corn bread or French bread and a salad.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, saute the ground turkey for 5 to 10 minutes, or until browned
Drain the turkey, stir in the tomato sauce and sugar, and set aside
In a medium bowl, combine the sour cream and cream cheese
Cook noodles according to package directions
Place them into a 9x13-inch baking dish, then layer the turkey mixture over the noodles
Then layer the sour cream mixture over the turkey, and top with cheese
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 20 to 35 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly
